name: Pegacorn-productions.GitHub.io
body: ### Welcome to Pegacorn Productions! Our current project: [ICS 484 Sea Urchin Game](https://github.com/Pegacorn-Productions/TestProject). ### Project Summary To be filled out once project is done ### Timeline * Initial meeting with group * Narrow down ideas * Finalize project idea * ... ### Progress Brainstorming: Andrew made a mockup of an ocean scene in Unity: Jack got the Kinect controls working with a demo: ### Due by next meeting * Anna: * Jack: * Kasey: * Kara: Create blog page * Andrew: * Michelle: ### Weekly Meetings * Local: Mondays 5:30-6:30 * Group: Wednesdays 6:30-7:30 ### Authors and Contributors In 2016, Anna Sikkink(@asikkink), Jack Lam(@jacksylam), Kasey Matsumoto(@kaseymat), Kara Knight(@knight125), Michelle Uchida(@paradeofcitylights), and Andrew Guagliardo(@staticjar) founded Pegacorn Productions. ### Support or Contact Having questions about our project? Sorry, we don't have a group email yet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
